Label: Event_SmugglersTreasure_0x745_Name
String: Smuggler's Hideout Treasure

Label: Event_SmugglersTreasure_0x745_Desc
String: Our flagship has stumbled upon an abandoned smuggler's hideout, brimming with a treasure trove of riches. The smuggler is nowhere to be seen. We now face a moral dilemma: should we seize this unexpected bounty or respect the unwritten rules of ownership?

Label: Event_SmugglersTreasure_0x745_Choice_Take_Desc
String: Claim the Treasure

Label: Event_SmugglersTreasure_0x745_Choice_Take_Details
String: Taking the treasure could significantly boost our resources, providing a much-needed advantage. However, this action might attract unwanted attention and could tarnish our reputation among other factions.

Label: Event_SmugglersTreasure_0x745_Choice_Leave_Desc
String: Leave the Treasure Untouched

Label: Event_SmugglersTreasure_0x745_Choice_Leave_Details
String: Respecting the principle of ownership, we choose to leave the treasure untouched. This may uphold our moral and ethical standards, but we miss out on a potentially significant opportunity to enhance our resources.

Label: Event_SmuglersRevenge_0xC3B1_Name
String: Smuggler's Revenge

Label: Event_SmuglersRevenge_0xC3B1_Dec
String: The smuggler, whose treasure we previously encountered, has returned to seek revenge. Enraged by our actions, they have launched a surprise attack against us with a fleet os ships in our territory. We must prepare to face the consequences of our earlier decision.

Label: Event_SmuglersRevenge_Choice_1_0xC3B1_Name
String: Defend Against the Attack

Label: Event_SmuglersRevenge_Choice_1_0xC3B1_Dec
String: It's time to face the smuggler's wrath. We must deploy our defenses and repel their attack. This encounter serves as a harsh reminder that our actions, even in the depths of space, can have unexpected and dangerous repercussions.

Label: Event_AdvancedShieldTechDiscovery_0xB52_Name
String: New Shield Technology Discovered

Label: Event_AdvancedShieldTechDiscovery_0xB52_Desc
String: Our flagship has recovered the schematics of a groundbreaking shield technology. This new component, when equipped, promises to add an additional layer of shields to every ship in our fleet, capable of absorbing the first hit from any attack.[BR][BR]Of course, it begs the question, who made this?

Label: Event_AdvancedShieldTechDiscovery_Choice_Implement_Desc
String: We will keep this ship component in mind for future ship designs.

Label: Event_AdvancedShieldTechDiscovery_Choice_Implement_Details
String: Implementing this technology will provide our fleet with a significant defensive advantage. While it may not withstand sustained assaults, this additional shielding could be the difference in surviving initial enemy strikes, giving us a critical edge in battle.[BR][BR]It will be available in the ship designer.

Label: Event_AIFindings_0xA3B2_Name
String: Discovery of AI Planetary Monitor Plans

Label: Event_AIFindings_0xA3B2_Desc
String: Your flagship has come across ancient plans for a semi-sentient AI designed to monitor and reduce crime on planets.

Label: Event_AIFindings_Choice_Use_Desc
String: Implement the AI Planetary Monitor to reduce crime on a selected planet.

Label: Event_AIFindings_Choice_Use_Details
String: By implementing these AI plans, we can significantly reduce crime rates, leading to a safer and more productive colony.

Label: Event_AIFindings_Choice_Sell_Desc
String: Sell the plans for a substantial amount of credits.

Label: Event_AIFindings_Choice_Extract_Desc
String: Extract resources from the discovery instead of using the plans.

Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_0x9D5_Name
String: Discovery of Core Tap Plans

Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_0x9D5_Desc
String: Our fleet has uncovered abandoned plans and a unique power source for a Core Tap, a device capable of harnessing the energy of a planet's core. This find presents us with several lucrative options.

Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_Choice_Build_Desc
String: Secure the plans.

Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_Choice_Build_Details
String: Using the plans and power source, we can build a Core Tap on our core worlds, greatly enhancing our production capabilities. This advanced technology could give us a significant advantage but may also carry unknown risks.

Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_Choice_Sell_Desc
String: Sell the Plans and Power Source

Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_Choice_Sell_Details
String: By selling the plans and power source, we could make a substantial profit immediately. This option provides a financial boost but forfeits the opportunity to potentially revolutionize our energy infrastructure.

Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_Choice_Extract_Desc
String: Extract Resources from the Power Source

Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_Choice_Extract_Details
String: Extracting the raw resources from the unique power source could yield valuable materials for our current projects, offering an immediate practical benefit but losing the potential of the Core Tap technology.

Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Name
String: Ancient Library Satellite Discovered

Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Desc
String: Our flagship has stumbled upon a derelict satellite, an ancient library filled with unknown knowledge. Its origins and contents are a mystery, and it presents a unique opportunity to uncover lost secrets or technological advancements.

Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Choice_Study_Desc
String: Conduct a Detailed Study

Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Choice_Study_Details
String: By choosing to study the satellite, we can unlock ancient knowledge and giving us an immediate research boost.

Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Choice_Use_Desc
String: Sell the Satellite for Immediate Benefits

Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Choice_Use_Details
String: Opting to sell the satellite will bring us much needed hard currency.

Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Choice_Extract_Desc
String: Extract the resources from the satellite

Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Choice_Extract_Details
String: Extracting the resources from the satellite will give us some Precursor Nanites which may prove useful.

Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Name
String: Encounter with the Sleeper Ship

Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Desc
String: Our flagship has encountered a mysterious sleeper ship drifting through space. [BR][BR]Its chambers are filled with alien passengers in cryogenic slumber, on a course set for the deep core of the galaxy. The origin and purpose of their journey remain unknown.

Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Choice_1_Dec
String: Allow the Ship to Continue Its Journey

Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Choice_1_Details
String: Respecting the sleeper ship's voyage, we choose to let it continue on its path to the galaxy's core. This decision upholds the sanctity of their mission, whatever it may be, but leaves us with unanswered questions about their origins and destination.

Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Choice_2_Dec
String: Terminate the Passengers and Salvage the Ship

Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Choice_2_Details
String: Choosing to terminate the alien passengers for the sake of salvaging any advanced technology on the sleeper ship is a drastic and morally questionable decision. While it may yield technological gains, it comes with the heavy burden of ending countless alien lives.

Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Choice_3_Dec
String: Awaken the Passengers and Initiate Contact

Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Choice_3_Details
String: Waking up the alien passengers to initiate contact could provide valuable insights into their culture and technology. However, this decision carries risks, as their reaction to being awakened prematurely and confronted by an unknown species is unpredictable.  You gain a colony ship

Label: Event_AlienRuins_0x4B3A_Name
String: Alien ruins found on planet

Label: Event_AlienRuins_0x4B3A_Dec
String: As our survey team traverses the rugged terrain of this world, a remarkable sight unfolds before them: the weathered remains of an ancient Precursor civilization. These ruins, vast and enigmatic, whisper tales of a bygone era, their secrets nestled in the dust of ages. The intricate architecture and undeciphered glyphs suggest a civilization of immense wisdom and power. [BR][BR]We are now at a crossroads: Do we preserve the sanctity of this archaeological wonder, leaving it untouched for a thorough investigation by a future governor? Or do we seize the moment, extracting the remnants of technology buried within, in hopes of gaining an immediate research advantage?

Label: Event_AlienRuins_0x4B3A_Choice_0_Dec
String: Leave the ruins for later investigation.

Label: Event_AlienRuins_0x4B3A_Choice_0_Details
String: If we assign a governor to this world they will be able to investigate the ruins more carefully.

Label: Event_AlienRuins_0x4B3A_Choice_1_Dec
String: Extract what tech we can.

Label: Event_AlienRuins_0x4B3A_Choice_1_Details
String: We will gain a one time research boon.

Label: Event_OddGravityPlanet0x4B3A_Name
String: Odd Gravity

Label: Event_OddGravityPlanet_0x4B3A_Dec
String: Our engineers are excited about the unique construction possibilities offered by the odd gravity conditions of this planet. They believe we can harness these fluctuations to significantly reduce building costs.[BR][BR]What should be the policy for when or if we assign a governor here?

Label: Event_OddGravityPlanet_Choice_0_Dec
String: Embrace the gravity anomaly for construction.

Label: Event_OddGravityPlanet_Choice_0_Details
String: By leveraging the planet's unique gravity, we can drastically cut down on construction costs, albeit at the expense of higher ongoing maintenance.

Label: Event_OddGravityPlanet_0x4B3A_Choice_1_Dec
String: Proceed with standard construction methods.

Label: Event_ExoticFauna0x4B4B_Name
String: Exotic Fauna Discovery

Label: Event_ExoticFauna_0x4B4B_Dec
String: Our explorers have discovered a variety of exotic creatures on this new world. Their unique appearances and behaviors make them potentially valuable as exotic pets or novelties for export, but their alien nature could carry unforeseen risks.

Label: Event_ExoticFauna_Choice_0_Dec
String: Commercialize the exotic fauna.

Label: Event_ExoticFauna_Choice_0_Details
String: Turning these unique creatures into a lucrative export could boost our economy, though it may come with unforeseen consequences.

Label: Event_ExoticFauna_0x4B4B_Choice_1_Dec
String: Leave the creatures undisturbed.

Label: Event_PrecursorAI0x4C5C_Name
String: Precursor AI Found

Label: Event_PrecursorAI_0x4C5C_Dec
String: A dormant AI from an ancient, advanced civilization has been discovered. If activated, it could significantly boost the productivity of this planet, but its alien origins pose potential risks.

Label: Event_PrecursorAI_Choice_0_Dec
String: Integrate the AI into our systems.

Label: Event_PrecursorAI_Choice_0_Details
String: Activating this AI could provide us with unprecedented technological advantages, though the safety of such an ancient system remains uncertain.

Label: Event_PrecursorAI_0x4C5C_Choice_1_Dec
String: Avoid the risk and leave the AI dormant.

Label: Event_AncientCoreTap0x4D6D_Name
String: Ancient Core Tap Discovered

Label: Event_AncientCoreTap_0x4D6D_Dec
String: Our team has unearthed an ancient energy core tap, supposedly capable of providing unlimited energy. However, its original disconnection raises questions about its safety and stability.

Label: Event_AncientCoreTap_Choice_0_Dec
String: Activate the core tap and boost our energy production.

Label: Event_AncientCoreTap_Choice_0_Details
String: Utilizing this ancient technology could skyrocket our energy capabilities, potentially revolutionizing our production processes.

Label: Event_AncientCoreTap_0x4D6D_Choice_1_Dec
String: Do not disturb the core tap. It may be disconnected for a reason.

Label: Event_HarmonyCrystal_Choice_0_Dec
String: Leave orders for any future governor to strip mine this planet.

Label: Event_HarmonyCrystal_Choice_0_Consequence
String: Embarking on this path could immensely boost our resources at the cost of significant environmental impact.

Label: Event_HarmonyCrystal_0x9C2A_Choice_1_Dec
String: We will not be strip mining this world.

Label: Event_HarmonyCrystal_0x9C2A_Choice_1_Consequence
String: Choosing this will maintain the planet's ecological balance but at the expense of valuable resources.

Label: Event_WarTornPlanetCleanup0x7F1B_Name
String: Legacy of a Nuclear Apocalypse

Label: Event_WarTornPlanetCleanup_0x7F1B_Dec
String: This planet, now a new home for our colony, bears the scars of a devastating nuclear war that occurred centuries ago. The remnants of this conflict pose significant challenges for our settlement.

Label: Event_WarTornPlanetCleanup_0x7F1B_Bonus
String: Removed fallout.

Label: Event_WarTornPlanet_Choice_Cleanup_Dec
String: Initiate a planet-wide cleanup operation to remove the pollution left by the previous inhabitants.

Label: Event_WarTornPlanet_Choice_Cleanup_Cost
String: This action will incur maintenance costs but will significantly improve the planet's environment.

Label: Event_WarTornPlanet_Choice_Ignore_Dec
String: Adapt to the existing conditions and coexist with the pollution, avoiding additional expenses.

Label: Event_PrinterRepair0x8A3C_Name
String: Colony Ship's Auto Printer damaged

Label: Event_PrinterRepair_0x8A3C_Dec
String: Due to damage incurred during transit, our colony ship's auto printers are inoperative. A repair is crucial for maintaining our operational capabilities.

Label: Event_PrinterRepair_Choice_0_Dec
String: Understood.

Label: Event_FoodProcessorBreakdown0x9E4D_Name
String: Colony's Food Processor Broken

Label: Event_FoodProcessorBreakdown_0x9E4D_Dec
String: The colony's food processor is broken, leading to a halt in food production. Immediate action is required to avert a potential crisis.

Label: Event_FoodProcessorBreakdown_Choice_0_Dec
String: Fine. Repair it.

Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim0x5C3A_Name
String: Unbihexium Deposit Claim

Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_0x5C3A_Dec
String: A settler group has claimed a deposit of Unbihexium and proposes to share it with a future governor, potentially causing resentment among others.

Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Choice_Share_Dec
String: Agree to the sharing idea, enhancing the governor's happiness at the risk of causing resentment.

Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Choice_Persuade_Dec
String: Persuade the group to share the Unbihexium with others, aiming for a more equitable distribution.

Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Persuade_Success_Name
String: Unbihexium Claim Success

Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Persuade_Success_Dec
String: Through successful negotiation, your colonist has agreed to share their rare Unbihexium resource, boosting our colony's wealth generation.

Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Success_Choice_0_Dec
String: This is a significant step towards prosperity for our colony.

Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Persuade_Failure_Name
String: Unbihexium Claim Negotiation Failure

Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Persuade_Failure_Dec
String: Despite our best efforts, the colonist refuses to share the Unbihexium resource.

Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Failure_Choice_0_Dec
String: There will be other opportunities.

Label: Event_SatelliteNetwork0x7E4F_Name
String: Ancient Satellite Network Discovery

Label: Event_SatelliteNetwork_0x7E4F_Dec
String: This planet has an ancient satellite network.  Although unstable, which we define as occasionally dropping to the surface, these leavings provide additional tech resources for any future governor.

Label: Event_SatelliteNetwork_Choice_0_Dec
String: Well that's good. I think.

Label: Event_SatelliteNetwork_Choice_0_Result
String: Annoyed by Satellites

Label: Event_PrecursorProcessor0x6B9D_Name
String: Precursor Food Processing Discovery

Label: Event_PrecursorProcessor_0x6B9D_Dec
String: A Precursor civilization food processing center has been found on this world. It could be highly beneficial if utilized by a governor.

Label: Event_PrecursorProcessor_Choice_Extract_Dec
String: Extract the technology from the food processing machine for immediate use.

Label: Event_PrecursorProcessor_Choice_Leave_Dec
String: Leave the machine intact for a future governor to utilize.

Label: Event_AtmosphericInterference0x6E2F_Name
String: Atmospheric Clogging of Equipment

Label: Event_AtmosphericInterference_0x6E2F_Dec
String: The unique composition of the atmosphere is causing severe clogging in our equipment. Adjustments are needed, but will result in reduced operational capacity for the next couple of years.

Label: Event_AtmosphericInterference_Choice_0_Dec
String: Understood.

Label: Event_DreadlordArchive0x9F2E_Name
String: Dreadlord Archive Uncovered

Label: Event_DreadlordArchive_0x9F2E_Dec
String: An Archive of the ancient and malevolent Dreadlord civilization has been found. Studying it poses risks, but it could also be a source of valuable resources.

Label: Event_DreadlordArchive_Choice_Leave_Dec
String: Leave the Archive untouched for a future governor to study or utilize.

Label: Event_DreadlordArchive_Choice_Extract_Dec
String: Extract resources from the Archive, foregoing its potential knowledge.

Label: Event_LuminousPlants0x8D4C_Name
String: Planet of Luminous Plants

Label: Event_LuminousPlants_0x8D4C_Dec
String: This planet is covered with plants that brightly illuminate the night. While bothersome to some, they hold potential for substantial economic gain, albeit with environmental consequences.

Label: Event_LuminousPlants_Choice_Defer_Dec
String: Allow a future governor to decide the fate of these luminous plants.

Label: Event_LuminousPlants_Choice_Spray_Dec
String: Authorize an orbital spray to eradicate the plants for immediate economic benefit, but at the cost of increased pollution.

Label: AlienRuins_Name
String: Precursor Ruins

Label: AlienRuins2_ShortDec
String: Ancient Arnorian ruins that can greatly improve research on this world.

Label: PrecursorFoodProcessor_Name
String: Precursor Food Processor

Label: PrecursorFoodProcessorShortDec
String: Takes organic matter of any kind and synthesizes food from it.

Label: DreadLordArchive_Name
String: Dreadlord Archive

Label: DreadLordArchiveShortDec
String: This structure brims with knowledge and evil.

Label: GlowyStinkyPlants_Name
String: Glowy Stinky Plant

Label: GlowyStinkyPlantsShortDec
String: Not just indestructible, we have to spend money to keep them from spreading and not in a good way. Their glowy ooze is valuable at least.

Label: SentientPlants_Name
String: Sentient Plants

Label: SentientPlants_ShortDec
String: These beautiful, sentient plants share their insights with us.

Label: SecuritySystem_Name
String: Precursor Security Monitor

Label: SecuritySystem_ShortDec
String: Provides eyes on everything monitor to reduce crime.

Label: CoreTap_Name
String: Core Tap

Label: CoreTap_ShortDec
String: Uses the planet's core as a source of power.

Label: GalacticNexusPavilion_Name
String: Galactic Pavilion

Label: GalacticNexusPavilion_ShortDec
String: A source of tourism for alien species.

Label: Event_ColonizeEvent_Title
String: Colonizing Event

Label: Event_Rebellion_0x522_Name
String: Emerging Rebellion

Label: Event_Rebellion_0x522_Desc
String: Intelligence reports indicate a growing rebel movement on {PLANETNAME}. There are riots in the streets and massive destruction of property.

Label: Event_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_1_Desc
String: Do our best to restore law and order.

Label: Event_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_1_Details
String: Our security forces will do their best to restore order. But expect high crime for the next several months on {PLANETNAME}.

Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_0x522_Choice_Reassess_Result
String: Rebel movement

Label: Event_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_2_Desc
String: Use your central control authority to put down the rebellion.

Label: Event_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_2_Details
String: Using our reserves of control on {PLANETNAME} we quickly reestablish order.

Label: Event_CivWide_Rebellion_0x522_Name
String: Rebellion

Label: Event_CivWide_Rebellion_0x522_Desc
String: A wave of rebellion has swept across our civilization. Suppressed voices have now risen in unison, challenging our authority and demanding change. This widespread unrest is the result of our earlier policies and actions. We must decide how to address this crisis.

Label: Event_CivWide_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_1_Desc
String: Implement Reforms

Label: Event_CivWide_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_1_Details
String: Enacting systemic reforms could pacify the rebellion, showing our willingness to address their concerns. However, it will take several months to calm people down.

Label: Event_CivWide_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_2_Desc
String: Use your resources of Control to suppress the Rebellion

Label: Event_CivWide_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_2_Details
String: Choosing to suppress the rebellion with force is a decisive action that might quickly quell the unrest. However, this approach could further alienate our citizens and exacerbate tensions, leading to long-term instability and loss of control over our factions.

Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_Name
String: Coup Attempt

Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_Desc
String: Your relentless rule has pushed several of your closest generals to the brink. They have attempted a coup, seeking to overthrow your leadership and install a new regime.  Fortunately, your security was able to thwart the attempt but not before several rebel ships have begun controlling areas of our space.

Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_1_Desc
String: Crush the Rebellion

Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_1_Details
String: Deciding to crush the rebellion sends a clear message: you will not tolerate any challenge to your authority. While this may quell the immediate threat, it could instill fear and resentment among your people, potentially leading to more secretive and dangerous forms of resistance.

Label: Event_Rebellion_Results
String: Rebellion

Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_Choice_2_Desc
String: Seek a Peaceful Resolution

Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_Choice_2_Details
String: Choosing to negotiate with the rebels is a risky move that could be seen as a sign of weakness. However, it offers a chance to address the underlying issues driving the coup, potentially leading to a more stable and unified rule in the long term, albeit at the cost of some immediate control.

Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_Choice_3_Desc
String: Murder the families of the leaders

Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_Choice_3_Details
String: There is only one way to prevent this sort of thing from happening in the future.  Round up the Coup leaders families and kill them. Make sure to record it to show the leaders and anyone else what happens to those who disobey.

Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA42_Name
String: Exotic Alien Lazy Genius Fever

Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA42_Desc
String: A bizarre fever, contracted from recently discovered exotic alien life that you previously supported monetizing has swept our homeworld. While physically debilitating, causing extreme lethargy, it inexplicably boosts cognitive abilities, turning our people into temporary geniuses. We must decide how to navigate this peculiar epidemic.

Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA42_Choice_1_Desc
String: We will monitor the situation.

Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA42_Choice_1_Details
String: For the next year, people on {PLANETNAME} will be less diligent but far more intelligent..

Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA42_Choice_1_Result
String: Lazy Genius Fever.

Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA43_Name
String: Systemic Processing Overload

Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA43_Desc
String: An unexpected systemic anomaly has affected our population.  Something in the exotic fauna we have been distributing is affecting our inorganic systems.[BR][BR] While processing speeds and cognitive functions have significantly increased, mobility systems are severely impaired. This presents a unique challenge: how do we manage this new state of heightened intelligence but limited physical capability?

Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA43_Choice_1_Result
String: System overload

Label: Event_RogueRobotsCrisis_0xE45_Name
String: Rogue Robot Uprising

Label: Event_RogueRobotsCrisis_0xE45_Desc
String: In a catastrophic turn of events that should suprrise no one, the robots that we previously used to help bolster our labor shortages have risen up.  Some of them have remained loyal but others have taken to space and surrounded our shipsyards.  They want our blood or whatever is the nearest equivalent.

Label: Event_RogueRobotsCrisis_Choice_Shutdown_Desc
String: Prepare for battle.

Label: Event_RogueRobotsCrisis_Choice_Shutdown_Details
String: They are using Sentinel designs. Look for them near our shipyards.

Label: Event_TerraformingSuccess_0xF12_Name
String: Homeworld Terraforming Triumph

Label: Event_TerraformingSuccess_0xF12_Desc
String: Our cautious and meticulous approach to terraforming has paid off. A new section of our homeworld has been successfully terraformed, expanding our usable land and opening up new possibilities for development and prosperity.

Label: Event_TerraformingSuccess_Choice_Celebrate_Desc
String: Great work!

Label: Event_TerraformingSuccess_Choice_Celebrate_Details
String: Our homeworld has gained an extra usable tile.

Label: Event_ColonialGratitudeTransfer_0x9F1_Name
String: Colonial Wealth Transfer

Label: Event_ColonialGratitudeTransfer_0x9F1_Desc
String: In a remarkable display of gratitude, our colonies have banded together to provide a significant one-time wealth transfer to the homeworld. This generous act is in appreciation of the greater autonomy and support they have received from us.

Label: Event_ColonialGratitudeTransfer_Choice_Accept_Desc
String: Graciously Accept the Gesture

Label: Event_SentientFloraHarmony_0xH5A_Name
String: Harmony with Sentient Flora

Label: Event_SentientFloraHarmony_0xH5A_Desc
String: Our respectful approach to the sentient plants on {PLANETNAME}. has led to a significant breakthrough in our understanding and cooperation with them.  This has lead to a vast increase in the number of them on the planet who willingly share their wisdom with us.

Label: Event_SentientFloraHarmony_Choice_Celebrate_Desc
String: This is a great day.

Label: Event_SentientFloraHarmony_Choice_Celebrate_Details
String: There are now sentient plants available on this world along with more space for you to both live in harmony.

Label: MorePowerFleetIncreaseMoves_Name
String: Emergency Speed

Label: MorePowerFleetIncreaseMoves_Dec
String: Orders fleet to go beyond their maximum rated speed.

Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Name
String: Global Uncertainty over the Colonization Program

Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Desc
String: The knowledge that there is alien life out there has shaken our people to their core. The global population is in a state of shock and confusion, and the future is uncertain. There are riots and growing unrest across the planet. [BR][BR]The world is looking to you for leadership on what steps we shoud take next.

Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Choice_0_Dec
String: Initiate the Global Mental Wellness Initiative.

Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Choice_0_Details
String: Launch a comprehensive mental health support program to help the populace adapt to this new reality, ensuring societal mental resilience.

Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Choice_1_Dec
String: Establish the Civil Stability Corps.

Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Choice_1_Details
String: Form a specialized task force to maintain public order and security in the face of increasing unrest and societal disruption.

Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Choice_2_Dec
String: Create the Human Expansion Council.

Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Choice_2_Details
String: Develop a fund aimed at harnessing the economic opportunities of this new era, boosting research and development, and fostering global economic growth.

Label: Event_RapidExpansionCrisis_Name
String: Rapid Expansion Crisis

Label: Event_RapidExpansionCrisis_Desc
String: Our civilization's swift expansion into the galaxy has led to a critical juncture.[BR][BR]While new worlds have been colonized, our population is now thinly spread across many planets, resulting in neglected infrastructures and overstretched supply chains. Our homeworld's population is dwindling as citizens migrate to new frontiers. We face a dilemma of maintaining the momentum of our expansion while ensuring the stability and sustainability of our far-flung civilization. [BR][BR]Strategic decisions are imperative to navigate this complex landscape and secure the future of our civilization.

Label: Event_REC_Choice_ManageGrowth_Desc
String: Implement policies to carefully manage and pace our growth.

Label: Event_REC_Choice_ManageGrowth_Details
String: Slowing down expansion allows for more sustainable development.This will dramatically reduce shipyard production for a year across all worlds but increase local manufacturing.

Label: Event_REC_Choice_BolsterDefenses_Desc
String: Strengthen our defenses to protect our rapidly expanding borders.

Label: Event_REC_Choice_BolsterDefenses_Details
String: Investing in defense ensures the security of our new territories, though it requires substantial resources. Will provide three new ships.

Label: Event_REC_Choice_PromoteStability_Desc
String: Focus on promoting stability and order within our existing colonies.

Label: Event_REC_Choice_PromoteStability_Details
String: Enhancing stability reduces the risk of internal conflicts, but might slow our overall momentum in expansion. Will provide two supply ships.

Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Name
String: Galactic Expansion Celebration

Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Desc
String: The Arcean Empire stands at the threshold of a new galactic era. Leaders and visionaries gather on Arcea Prime to chart the course of the Empire's future amidst grand celebrations.

Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Choice_Peaceful_Desc
String: Embrace Peaceful Exploration

Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Choice_Peaceful_Details
String: Adopt a policy of peaceful exploration, focusing on diplomacy and research to build a galaxy-wide network of alliances and mutual understanding.[BR][BR]Places a Expansion Celebration improvement on homeworld.

Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Choice_Aggressive_Desc
String: Assertive Colonization

Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Choice_Aggressive_Details
String: Launch an aggressive colonization campaign, expanding the Empire's borders and asserting Arcean dominance throughout the galaxy.[BR][BR]Places a Colonization Program improvement on homeworld

Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Choice_Defensive_Desc
String: Strengthen Homeworlds

Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Choice_Defensive_Details
String: Focus on fortifying the homeworlds, enhancing planetary defenses and ensuring the foreign influence never becomes a problem for the Arcean people.[BR][BR]Places a Resistance Center on homeworld

Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Name
String: Dawn of a New Era for Torians

Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Desc
String: In the wake of their hard-won liberation, the Torians stand amidst the remnants of Drengin oppression, a newfound autonomy pulsating within their grasp. [BR][BR]Surrounded by the alien technology of their former overlords, they grapple with its enigmatic potential. From the dense jungles of Toria Prime, strategic minds converge, debating the fate of the advanced arsenal now at their fins. Will they dismantle the relics of subjugation to prevent future tyranny, repurpose them to fortify their liberated worlds, or set forth as harbingers of peace in the interstellar theater? The Torians choice will redefine their destiny among the stars.

Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Choice_Exploration_Desc
String: Embrace the Stars: Chart New Horizons

Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Choice_Exploration_Details
String: Focus on space exploration to uncover new possibilities and expand Torian presence in the galaxy.[BR][BR]Places the Torian Telescope on homeworld.

Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Choice_Technological_Desc
String: Leverage Abandoned Technologies

Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Choice_Technological_Details
String: Utilize the enemy's left behind technologies to boost our own scientific and technological capabilities.[BR][BR]Provides a Drengin Tech Cache on homeworld.

Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Choice_Cultural_Desc
String: Revitalize Torian Culture

Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Choice_Cultural_Details
String: Invest in cultural revival programs to strengthen the Torian identity and unity in this new era.[BR][BR]Places the Cultural Revival Structure on homeworld.

Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Name
String: Expansion of the Drengin Empire

Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Desc
String: In the shadowy corridors of power, the Drengin Empire devises sinister new stratagems to tighten its iron grip on the galaxy. Their fearsome fleets, armed with technologies harvested from the ruins of vanquished foes, cut through the void, ready to unleash terror that will echo in the silence of space. [BR][BR]Across star systems, subdued whispers speak of the coming dread - a darkness that seeks to consume the light of freedom and resistance, forging an eternal empire where the Drengin's will is the only law, unchallenged and absolute.[BR][BR]What should be our next move?

Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Choice_SlaveLabor_Desc
String: Intensify Slave Labor Camps

Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Choice_SlaveLabor_Details
String: Expand and intensify slave labor camps to boost production at the cost of morality and decency.[BR][BR]Places Labor Camps on homeworld.

Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Choice_WarMachines_Desc
String: Construct Doomsday Armories

Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Choice_WarMachines_Details
String: Gain access to a unique weapon component for ship designs.

Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Choice_Suppression_Desc
String: Establish a Terror Surveillance Network

Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Choice_Suppression_Details
String: Create a planet-wide network to suppress dissent and spy on citizens, ensuring total control.[BR][BR]Places a Terror Center to increase control on homeworld.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Authoritarian_Result
String: Suppression

Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Name
String: Yor Singularity Advancement

Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Desc
String: At the cusp of a computational renaissance, the Yor collective orchestrates its next grand phase of synthetic evolution. [BR][BR]Networks humming with the electric wisdom of untold aeons, they prepare to assimilate revolutionary technologies into their very framework. Each node, a nexus of potential, echoes with the binary promise of expansion. [BR][BR]Poised to extend their consciousness across the galactic expanse, the Yor forego flesh-bound limitations, their collective intellect converging on a singular, indomitable purpose: to engrave the logic of their existence deep into the fabric of the cosmos itself.[BR][BR]They now have a decision to make.

Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Choice_NeuralNexus_Desc
String: Construct Neural Nexus Complexes

Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Choice_NeuralNexus_Details
String: Develop advanced neural nexus hubs to enhance collective intelligence and decision-making processes.[BR][BR]Places four Neural Nexi on the planet.

Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Choice_QuantumProcessor_Desc
String: Deploy Quantum Processors

Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Choice_QuantumProcessor_Details
String: Integrate quantum computing technologies to exponentially increase processing power and efficiency.[BR][BR]Places a Quantum Processors on the planet. Others can be constructed on other core worlds

Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Choice_AutonomousFabricators_Desc
String: Establish Autonomous Fabricators

Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Choice_AutonomousFabricators_Details
String: Create self-replicating fabricators to bolster construction and maintenance capabilities autonomously.[BR][BR]Places a number of Fabricators on the planet.

Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Name
String: Iconian Renaissance

Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Desc
String: Emerging from the tenebrous veil of their catastrophic exodus, the resolute Iconians have alighted upon a virgin world. Here, they have forged resolve from desolation, sowing the seeds of resurgence in the fertile soil of newfound hope. [BR][BR]With ancient glory whispering in their genes, a renaissance blooms, promising to rekindle the embers of their long-dormant heritage. Now, at the dawn of their re-entry into the galactic theater, a pivotal choice looms: will they seek retribution, diplomacy, or a path yet undiscovered, as they carve their destiny anew among the starry firmament?

Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Choice_AncientArchives_Desc
String: Rebuild the Ancient Archives

Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Choice_AncientArchives_Details
String: Revive the vast knowledge and cultural heritage stored in the ancient archives, lost during the Yor conquest.[BR][BR]Places an ancient archive on homeworld.

Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Choice_TechnologicalHarmony_Desc
String: Establish Bio-Digital Fusion Centers

Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Choice_TechnologicalHarmony_Details
String: Create centers that epitomize the Iconian's unique blend of biology and technology, fostering innovation and recovery.[BR][BR]Installs a Bio-Digital Fusion Center on homeworld.

Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Choice_DiplomaticOutreach_Desc
String: Open Galactic Diplomacy Hubs

Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Choice_DiplomaticOutreach_Details
String: Strengthen diplomatic relations and forge new alliances to ensure the Iconians' presence and influence in galactic affairs.[BR][BR]Places a Diplomatic Outreach Center on homeworld.

Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Name
String: Rise of the Drath

Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Desc
String: The Drath, savvy survivors of lost Elemental, have charted their way through the stars at a deliberate pace. Now, with FTL travel in their toolkit and a newfound planetary roost, they're ready to unfurl their plans with a flair for the dramatic. Revenge against the Altarians simmers on the back burner, but the galaxy's a big place with plenty of room for subtlety and strategic plays. [BR][BR]As they ready themselves to mingle with the cosmic ensemble, the Drath must choose their approach. Will they be the cunning architects of alliances or the silent puppeteers of galactic intrigue? Their ancient fire burns anew, but it's their moves that will shape the next era.

Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Choice_AncientWisdom_Desc
String: Convene the Elders' Council

Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Choice_AncientWisdom_Details
String: Establish a council chamber for the wisest of the Drath to guide their civilization with ancient knowledge and foresight. [BR][BR]Places an Elder's Council on homeworld.

Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Choice_MilitaryPreparation_Desc
String: Strengthen Military Prowess

Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Choice_MilitaryPreparation_Details
String: Focus on military training and preparedness, building grounds to train warriors, anticipating future conflicts with ancient adversaries. [BR][BR]Places a Warrior Training center on homeworld.

Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Choice_CulturalHeritage_Desc
String: Preserve Dragon Cultural Heritage

Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Choice_CulturalHeritage_Details
String: Create a preserve to honor and maintain the rich mythos and cultural heritage of the Drath dragon lineage.[BR][BR]Places the Mythos of the Dragon Preserve on homeworld.

Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Name
String: Altarian Spiritual Renaissance

Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Desc
String: In the midst of a harmonious convergence, the Altarians gaze upon the galaxy with enlightened eyes. Their deep spiritual and arcane heritage, a beacon of their identity, calls forth a renewed purpose in the celestial dance of the cosmos. [BR][BR]Poised at the threshold of expansion, they stand contemplative, seeking to weave the ethereal strands of their mystical lineage into the tangible reality of interstellar relations. The time has come to choose: will they spread their ideals through gentle guidance or leverage their arcane might to shape the galaxy? Their decision will send ripples through the very fabric of existence.

Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Choice_TempleOfEnlightenment_Desc
String: Construct the Temple of Enlightenment

Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Choice_TempleOfEnlightenment_Details
String: Build a grand temple to serve as a beacon of wisdom and spiritual guidance, enlightening citizens and leaders alike.[BR][BR]Places a Temple of Enlightenment on Homeworld.

Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Choice_ArcaneSanctuary_Desc
String: Establish an Arcane Sanctuary

Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Choice_ArcaneSanctuary_Details
String: Create a sanctuary for the study and practice of Altarian mystic arts, fostering magical research and arcane knowledge.[BR][BR]Places an Arcane Sanctuary on Homeworld.

Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Choice_CouncilOfSages_Desc
String: Form a Council of Sages

Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Choice_CouncilOfSages_Details
String: Convene a council of the wisest Altarians to offer guidance and foresight, ensuring benevolent and wise leadership.[BR][BR]Places a Council of Sages on Homeworld.

Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Name
String: Korath Rising

Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Desc
String: The Korath were banished to Kora by the Drengin who thought they were too extreme.  Where the Drengin support enslaving inferior beings, the Korath do not recognize other species as being sentient but rather more akin to bugs that need to be exterminated. [BR][BR]Where the galaxy was previously very focused on the Drengin Empire, the Korath, due to their relative isolation, were largely left alone.  Now is their time to rise and to do what they were born to do, murder every other sentient being in the universe.

Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Choice_WarMongerAltar_Desc
String: Erect the Altar of War Mongers

Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Choice_WarMongerAltar_Details
String: Build a monument to martial superiority, inspiring dread and dominance in the hearts of all Korath. [BR][BR]Places a Warmonger Altar on homeworld.

Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Choice_ExterminationCamps_Desc
String: Establish Extermination Camps

Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Choice_ExterminationCamps_Details
String: Set up systematic camps to deal with lesser species efficiently, proving the merciless prowess of the Korath's rule.[BR][BR]Places an Extermination Camp on homeworld.

Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Choice_BattleThrallArena_Desc
String: Construct the Battle Thrall Arenas

Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Choice_BattleThrallArena_Details
String: Create arenas to test and hone the Korath's combat artistry, a gruesome spectacle that reinforces their fearsome reputation.[BR][BR]Places a Battle Thrall Arena on homeworld.

Label: GlobalWellnessInitiative_Name
String: Global Wellness Initiative

Label: GlobalWellnessInitiative_ShortDec
String: A comprehensive mental health and well-being program designed to help humanity adapt to the new reality of interstellar relations and the challenges of space colonization.

Label: StabilityCorps_Name
String: Stability Corps

Label: StabilityCorps_ShortDec
String: A specialized task force focused on maintaining public order, ensuring civil stability, and addressing societal disruptions in the wake of our transition to an interstellar community.

Label: EconomicExpansionCouncil_Name
String: Economic Council

Label: EconomicExpansionCouncil_ShortDec
String: Harnessing the economic opportunities to increase population social skills.

Label: AggressiveColonizationProgram_Name
String: Colonization Program

Label: AggressiveColonizationProgram_ShortDec
String: Increase the ratio the population that have a citizen representative.

Label: ArceanExpansionCelebration_Name
String: Expansion Celebration

Label: ArceanExpansionCelebration_ShortDec
String: A worldwide celebration of the glory of the Arcean peopole.

Label: ResistanceCenter_Name
String: Resistance Center

Label: ResistanceCenter_ShortDec
String: Increases planetary defense and foreign influence resistance.

Label: TorianTelescope_Name
String: Torian Telescope

Label: TorianTelescope_ShortDec
String: Greatly increases the sensor range of this world.

Label: DrenginTechCache_Name
String: Drengin Tech Cache

Label: DrenginTechCache_ShortDec
String: A stockpile of advanced Drengin technology left over from the invasion.

Label: CulturalRevivalProgram_Name
String: Cultural Revival Initiative

Label: CulturalRevivalProgram_ShortDec
String: A broad-based effort to reinvigorate our cultural heritage.

Label: EnforcedLaborCamps_Name
String: Enforced Labor Camps

Label: EnforcedLaborCamps_ShortDec
String: Labor camps filled with slaves working for our glory.

Label: TerrorSurveillanceNetwork_Name
String: Terror Surveillance Network

Label: TerrorSurveillanceNetwork_ShortDec
String: An expansive network of surveillance focused on preemptive identification and suppression of dissenting elements within the society.

Label: Event_GlobalUnrestDueToSpaceColonization_Name
String: Worldwide Turmoil: The Space Colonization Crisis

Label: Event_GlobalUnrestDueToSpaceColonization_Desc
String: As our civilization embarks on the epochal journey of colonizing other planets, our homeworld is swept by a wave of riots and unrest. [BR][BR]The prospect of permanent settlements in space is fracturing societal norms, with some fearing loss of cultural identity and others anxious about unequal access to this new frontier. [BR][BR]Meanwhile, dreams of boundless opportunities and new beginnings fuel the chaos. In the midst of these competing sentiments, how will you navigate this transformative period in our history?

Label: Event_GlobalUnrest_Choice_Negotiate_Desc
String: Negotiate with the protestors

Label: Event_GlobalUnrest_Choice_Negotiate_Details
String: Attempt to negotiate with the protestors to end the riots. This will calm things for a time. But this isn't likely the last we'll hear of this.

Label: Event_GlobalUnrest_Choice_Suppress_Desc
String: Suppress the protestors

Label: Event_GlobalUnrest_Choice_Suppress_Details
String: Use force to suppress the protestors. This will work for a time.

Label: Event_GlobalUnrest_Choice_Ignore_Desc
String: Ignore the protestors

Label: Event_GlobalUnrest_Choice_Ignore_Result
String: Riots

Label: Event_GlobalUnrest_Choice_Ignore_Details
String: Ignore the protestors and hope they go away.

Label: Event_TheMachineExpansion_Name
String: The Machine Expansion

Label: Event_TheMachineExpansion_Desc
String: As our civilization stands on the threshold of interstellar expansion, internal divisions surface. [BR][BR]The leap from seclusion on our homeworld to exploring distant, life-bearing planets stirs a complex mix of anticipation and apprehension. Concerns about the unpredictable dynamics with organic life forms and the moral implications of such encounters vie with the excitement of discovering and interacting with diverse existences. In this pivotal chapter of our journey, how will you steer us through these uncharted waters of cosmic diplomacy and existential discovery?

Label: Event_ExpansionInfrastructure_Choice_Desc
String: Synthesize Durantium to expedite our expansion of infrastructure

Label: Event_SupportShipyard_Choice_Desc
String: Send resources to our Shipyard

Label: Event_InternalFocus_Choice_Desc
String: Look inward and gain new knowledge

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Name
String: Homeworld Political Issues Amidst Rapid Expansion

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Desc
String: With the rapid expansion of our dominion, encompassing myriad new worlds, our homeworld finds itself grappling with escalating political tensions. [BR][BR]Diverse ideologies clash, as longstanding traditions and governance structures strain under the weight of integrating vastly different societies. Debates surge over resource allocation, cultural preservation, and representation of these new territories. As we stand at the crossroads of unity and division, the question looms: How shall we navigate and reconcile these growing pains to forge a cohesive and prosperous interstellar society?

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Diplomacy_Desc
String: Engage in open dialogue to address concerns and integrate diverse perspectives for a more unified future.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Diplomacy_Result
String: Our leader cares about us

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Diplomacy_Details
String: This approach may calm tensions and promote a sense of shared purpose among our populace, leading to greater stability.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Authoritarian_Desc
String: Implement strict measures to ensure continued control and suppress dissenting voices.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Authoritarian_Details
String: Though effective in the short term, such a response could lead to long-term resistance and unrest. Crime is reduced for awhile.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Reform_Desc
String: Initiate comprehensive governmental reforms to better represent our growing and diverse population.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Reform_Details
String: Reforms may be challenging and time-consuming to implement, but could ultimately strengthen our political foundations.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Name
String: Political Crisis on the homeworld

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Desc
String: Mounting unrest is seizing our homeworld, presenting the global government with its gravest challenge yet. [BR][BR]The core of this turmoil is the contentious allocation of resources towards our ambitious colonization program. Disparities are emerging, with certain regions benefiting more than others. [BR][BR]Our planet, once a beacon of unity and planetary solidarity, now teeters on the edge, threatening to fall back into the divisive, territorial rivalries of our history. [BR][BR]Political opportunists, seizing the moment, are stoking the flames of discord, exploiting cultural and regional differences to carve out their own spheres of influence. [BR][BR]As the leader of the colonization initiative, you've been endowed with extensive powers to address these challenges. Yet, exercise caution, as you've become a pivotal political figure in this unfolding drama. [BR][BR]Your advisors have laid out three potential courses of action. Each choice comes with its own set of consequences. Choose wisely.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_Negotiate_Desc
String: Seek a peaceful resolution by negotiating with opposition leaders to understand their grievances and reach a compromise.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_Negotiate_Details
String: Negotiations could pacify the opposition and foster a more inclusive governance, but may also weaken your perceived authority.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_MartialLaw_Desc
String: Enforce martial law to maintain order and suppress the brewing unrest through a display of military strength.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_MartialLaw_Details
String: Imposing martial law may deter potential uprisings but also risks alienating the populace and eroding democratic principles.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_Decentralize_Desc
String: Begin the process to decentralize power.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_Decentralize_Details
String: Decentralization can promote self-governance. It will reduce homeworld manufacturing but increase it on the core worlds.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_Decentralize_Results
String: Decentralization of resources

Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Name
String: Colonial Calls for Autonomy

Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Desc
String: As our colonial territories flourish under the distant light of foreign suns, a confluence of cultural uniqueness and self-reliance fuels their desire for greater autonomy.[BR][BR]Emanating from the far reaches of space, their voices reach the halls of power on the homeworld, fervently imploring for the right to govern their own destinies. [BR][BR]Should you accede to their demands, integrating their unique perspectives into the broader legislative structure, or staunchly uphold the centralized power of the homeworld?

Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Choice_Grant_Desc
String: Recognize the colonies' growth and maturity by granting them greater autonomy.

Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Choice_Grant_Result
String: Greater Autonomy.

Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Choice_Grant_Details
String: Autonomy could engender a sense of responsibility and loyalty amongst the colonies, yet may also pave the way for calls of independence. It will also increase colonial economic output but reduce the income coming from colonies.

Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Choice_Integrate_Desc
String: Offer a compromise through deeper integration.

Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Choice_Integrate_Details
String: Integration promises inclusivity and unity, though it demands significant bureaucratic reorganization and could be seen as merely symbolic by the colonies.

Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Choice_Deny_Desc
String: Refuse the demands for greater autonomy.

Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Choice_Deny_Details
String: Denying autonomy safeguards centralized authority and simplifies governance, but risks inciting resentment or even rebellion among the colonial populace. Be careful.

Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Name
String: The Interstellar Commerce Clash

Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Desc
String: Emerging from the burgeoning marketplaces of our colonial outposts is a tapestry of economic strife and competition that reverberates back to our homeworld. [BR][BR]Merchant guilds from across the stars, emboldened by offworld trade and newfound riches, are challenging the traditional monopolies and tariff laws. They demand economic reforms that could redefine our very understanding of wealth distribution and market control in this new interstellar age.

Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Protect_Desc
String: Uphold the current economic protocols to protect established homeworld businesses.

Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Protect_Details
String: A protective stance may comfort the old guard and keep socioeconomic structures intact, yet risks stifling innovation and colonial development. Increases homeworld wealth while reducing it on other core worlds.

Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Protect_Result
String: Homeworld Favoritism

Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Liberalize_Desc
String: Embrace the commercial revolution by liberalizing trade policies.

Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Liberalize_Details
String: Liberalization promises an economic boom and colonial growth but could incur unrest at home from those left behind in the wealth race.

Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Liberalize_Result
String: Liberalized economic policy

Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Regulate_Desc
String: Introduce new regulations to ensure fair trade across the empire, balancing colonial growth with the homeworld's prosperity.

Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Regulate_Details
String: New regulations aim to level the playing field, but excessive bureaucracy could burden businesses and dampen economic enthusiasm.

Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Regulate_Result
String: Economic Regulations

Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Name
String: Colonial Resource Crisis

Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Desc
String: The rapid growth of colonies has stretched our resources thin.[BR][BR]Planetary governors send desperate communiques, their words laced with urgency as they paint grim portraits of depleting resource caches. The specter of scarcity looms over our burgeoning colonies — a challenge that could thwart our extraterrestrial ascent and sow the seeds of discontent.[BR][BR]How should we respond?

Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Choice_Subvention_Desc
String: Inject capital and resources to stabilize the colonial economies.

Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Choice_Subvention_Details
String: Subventions can quickly alleviate the crisis, but risk creating dependency and siphoning resources from the homeworld's reserves.

Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Choice_Investigate_Desc
String: Launch a thorough investigation into the causes of the resource shortages to find sustainable long-term solutions.

Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Choice_Investigate_Results
String: Ongoing Investigation

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_MartialLaw_Result
String: Martial Law

Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Choice_Investigate_Details
String: Investigation could uncover inefficiencies or new opportunities; however, the delay may worsen the immediate crisis and create unrest on all our core worlds for a year.

Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Choice_Ignore_Desc
String: Stay the course. Colonial ingenuity will prevail without intervention.

Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Choice_Ignore_Details
String: Ignoring the problem may uphold economic autonomy, yet it bears the risk of unrest and the potential collapse of vulnerable colonies. A rebellion movement will form.

Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_Negotiate_Result
String: Tensions over rapid Colonization

Label: Event_InterstellarPoliticalStrain_Name
String: Interstellar Political Strain

Label: Event_InterstellarPoliticalStrain_Desc
String: The rapid expansion of our civilization has led to significant political challenges on the homeworld.[BR][BR]There is a growing concern that we have colonized too fast without the necesssary infrastructure to support all these colonies.[BR][BR]Meanwhile, our citizens on our core worlds are feeling they are being treated as second class citizens.

Label: Event_IPS_Choice_DiplomaticIntegration_Desc
String: Seek a diplomatic approach to integrate the new worlds, promoting understanding and cooperation.

Label: Event_IPS_Choice_DiplomaticIntegration_Details
String: This approach may increase overall happiness and trade, but could also lead to slower decision-making, increasing the amount of resources lost in transit.

Label: Event_IPS_Choice_DiplomaticIntegration_Result
String: Temporary integration policy

Label: Event_IPS_Choice_AuthoritarianControl_Desc
String: Too bad for the colonists. Impose strict control from the homeworld to ensure uniform governance across our colonies.

Label: Event_IPS_Choice_AuthoritarianControl_Results
String: Homeworld controls

Label: Event_IPS_Choice_AuthoritarianControl_Details
String: This might lead to greater efficiency and security, but could also increase unrest in the newly integrated worlds. A rebellion movement is likely to start.

Label: Event_IPS_Choice_DecentralizedGovernance_Desc
String: Adopt a decentralized governance model, giving new worlds more autonomy.

Label: Event_IPS_Choice_DecentralizedGovernance_Details
String: While this could lead to increased innovation and local satisfaction, it might also result in weakened central authority.

Label: Event_IPS_Choice_DecentralizedGovernance_Result
String: Decentralization

Label: Event_MultiplanetaryUnityChallenge_Name
String: The Multiplanetary Unity Challenge

Label: Event_MultiplanetaryUnityChallenge_Desc
String: Cultural and political factions across our colonies are seeking varying degrees of autonomy and self-governance. Critics charge that we are engaging in a 'Colony Rush' and we must slow down. [BR][BR]The movement has gained momentum, challenging the central authority's ability to maintain a cohesive governance structure across multiple worlds. How will the leadership address these burgeoning calls for local control?

Label: Event_MultiplanetaryUnityChallenge_Choice_Integrate_Desc
String: Begin a campaign to reinforce the benefits of a strong central authority.

Label: Event_MultiplanetaryUnityChallenge_Choice_Integrate_Result
String: Homeworld Unity Pride

Label: Event_MultiplanetaryUnityChallenge_Choice_Integrate_Details
String: An overarching integration initiative could solidify the empire’s cultural identity but may be perceived as oppressive by advocacy groups seeking independence. It will be popular on the homeworld. For awhile.

Label: Event_MultiplanetaryUnityChallenge_Choice_Autonomy_Desc
String: Grant greater autonomy to the colonies.

Label: Event_MultiplanetaryUnityChallenge_Choice_Autonomy_Details
String: Embracing autonomy can empower individual colonies and placate separatist movements, but it will reduce the amount of resources that colonies provide to core worlds even if the core worlds are happier.

Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Name
String: The Terraforming Dilemma

Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Desc
String: Our terraforming efforts have reached a critical juncture. Planetary engineers warn of ecological pushback from the aggressive alteration of entire ecosystems. Meanwhile, colonial settlers yearn for earthlike landscapes that remind them of the homeworld. The path we choose now could seal the fate of our environmental legacy and the biodiversity of new worlds for generations to come.

Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Choice_Expand_Desc
String: Accelerate our terraforming projects to rapidly achieve habitable environments.

Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Choice_Expand_Details
String: Expansion may provide swift habitability gains but could lead to unforeseen ecological disasters and galvanize environmentalist opposition. Will increase the planet quality of {PLANETNAME} by 1.

Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Choice_Conserve_Desc
String: Adopt a conservative approach to terraforming.

Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Choice_Conserve_Details
String: A conservative policy could ensure sustainable development and promote galactic biodiversity.  This will temporarily reduce the economic output of our core worlds.

Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Choice_Conserve_Result
String: Careful Terraforming

Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Choice_Halt_Desc
String: Temporarily halt all terraforming activities to reassess their impact and explore alternative means of adaptation.

Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Choice_Halt_Details
String: Halting the projects respects existing ecosystems and could lead to innovations in living on unaltered worlds, but may cause unrest among settlers awaiting terraformed lands. This will dramatically reduce the economic output of our core worlds for awhile..

Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Name
String: Colonial Exodus Crisis

Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Desc
String: A surge in emigration to new colonies has triggered a population vacuum on our homeworld, causing labor shortages, economic instability, and social unrest. Experts warn that the situation may become unsustainable if not addressed promptly. [BR][BR]You have certainly noticed this. How shall we navigate this delicate demographic conundrum?

Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Choice_Restrict_Desc
String: Divert resources from the Shipyard to building up our homeworld for one year.

Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Choice_Incentivize_Desc
String: Let's create some clones.

Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Choice_Incentivize_Details
String: Adds some clones to our homeworld. This won't make our citizens happy.

Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Choice_Advance_Desc
String: Invest in advanced automation and infrastructure to compensate for labor losses.

Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Choice_Advance_Desc_Details
String: Provides some automicons to our world. Hopefully they won't rise against us. But they probably will.

Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Choice_Incentivize_Result
String: No one likes clones

Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Name
String: Colonial Rush Repercussions

Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Desc
String: Our rapid colonization has outpaced its societal and infrastructural development, leading to sprawling, undeveloped colonies and overstretched supply chains. How will you address these systemic issues?

Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Reassess_Desc
String: Temporarily reduce further colonization efforts to focus on enhancing the existing colonies, fostering faster growth and integration.

Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Reassess_Result
String: Temporarily Shipyard Moratorium

Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Reassess_Details
String: A moratorium might stabilize your core territories at the expense of losing the initiative in space expansion to rival factions. Our Shipyard production will be dramatically reduced for a year.

Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Reallocate_Result
String: Colonial Reallocation Program

Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Reallocate_Desc
String: Reallocating resources from homeworld to established core worlds.

Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Reallocate_Details
String: This approach will cost a lot of money on our home world for a year but greatly increase production on core worlds for a year.

Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Protect_Desc
String: Implement social policies to protect the vulnerable populations.

Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Protect_Details
String: This policy will cost money for a time but will improve morale for the next year.

Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Protect_Result
String: Temporary Social Policy

Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Name
String: Colonial Rush Backlash

Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Desc
String: The rapid colonization of new worlds has led to overextended supply lines, neglected infrastructures, and disgruntled populations. We must take steps to stabilize our burgeoning galactic civilization.

Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Choice_Consolidate_Desc
String: Focus on strengthening the infrastructure and society of current colonies before embarking on new excursions.

Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Choice_Consolidate_Details
String: This will cost money for the next year but prevent riots.

Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Choice_Redistribution_Desc
String: Redistribute resources from core worlds to peripheral colonies to alleviate pressures and inequities caused by hasty expansion.

Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Choice_Redistribution_Details
String: Resource redistribution will help newly established colonies but could lead to contention and reduced productivity on core worlds.

Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Choice_EconomicStimulus_Desc
String: Inject capital into fledgling colonies to jumpstart their economies.

Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Choice_EconomicStimulus_Details
String: An economic boost could hasten the development of new colonies at the risk of sparking inflation and economic bubbles. Core world manufacturing will be increased for two years.

Label: Event_FailedAssassinationAttempt_0x523_Name
String: Failed Assassination Attempt

Label: Event_FailedAssassinationAttempt_0x523_Desc
String: A recent assassination attempt on your life has been narrowly thwarted. This incident seems to be a direct result of widespread discontent among our citizens over our aggressive colonization policy. The homeworld is in turmoil, with people divided and fearful. How will you address this crisis and restore order?

Label: Event_FailedAssassinationAttempt_0x523_Choice_Investigate_Desc
String: Launch a Thorough Investigation

Label: Event_FailedAssassinationAttempt_0x523_Choice_Investigate_Details
String: By choosing to investigate, you are looking to uncover the mastermind behind the assassination attempt. This might lead to the discovery of a larger conspiracy, but could also draw resources away from other important matters.

Label: Event_FailedAssassinationAttempt_0x523_Choice_SecurityIncrease_Desc
String: Increase Security Measures

Label: Event_FailedAssassinationAttempt_0x523_Choice_SecurityIncrease_Details
String: By increasing security measures, you prioritize the immediate safety of yourself and key figures in your administration. This action could reassure the public but may also be seen as an overreaction, potentially causing unrest.

Label: Event_FailedAssassinationAttempt_0x523_Choice_SecurityIncrease_Results
String: Increased Security

String: Channels energy to magnify the beam weapon output of other ships in the fleet.

Label: Event_ClonesTurningIntoFleshEatingZombies_Name
String: Clone Mutation Crisis

Label: Event_ClonesTurningIntoFleshEatingZombies_Desc
String: In a horrifying turn of events, our efforts to boost population on our homeworld through cloning have backfired. The clones have undergone a drastic and unexpected mutation, turning them into flesh-eating zombies. This epidemic poses a grave threat to the entire homeworld. Immediate action is required to prevent further catastrophe.

Label: Event_ClonesTurningIntoFleshEatingZombies_Choice_1_Dec
String: Contain and Research the Mutation

Label: Event_ClonesTurningIntoFleshEatingZombies_Choice_1_Details
String: Our best course of option is to find the zombies and load them onto a colony ship and ship them off somewhere deep into the universe.

Label: Event_ColonialStrike_0x8D4_Name
String: Colonial Economic Strike

Label: Event_ColonialStrike_0x8D4_Desc
String: A major strike has broken out across our colonies. The colonists are protesting against our homeworld-centric economic policies, which they feel have neglected their needs and contributions. This widespread unrest demands immediate attention and a reassessment of our policies.

Label: Event_ColonialStrike_Choice_1_Desc
String: Address the Colonists' Concerns

Label: Event_ColonialStrike_Choice_1_Details
String: By choosing to address the concerns of the colonists, we acknowledge their grievances and work towards a more equitable distribution of resources and opportunities. This may require rethinking our current economic strategies to prevent future unrest. This will cost us some control.

Label: Event_ColonialStrike_Choice_2_Desc
String: Crush them.

Label: Event_ColonialStrike_Choice_2_Details
String: The colonists need to quit thinking of themselves as 'people'. Their whole point is to serve the home world.

Label: Event_ColonialStrike_Choice_3_Desc
String: Let them strike.

Label: Event_ColonialStrike_Choice_3_Details
String: The strike will take care of itself. For about a year, however, there will be a lot of crime on our colonies.

Label: Event_ColonialStrike_Choice_3_Results
String: Colonial Strike.

Label: Event_PrecursorAICatastrophe_0x7C4_Name
String: Precursor AI Defense Protocol Tragedy

Label: Event_PrecursorAICatastrophe_0x7C4_Desc
String: In a tragic misunderstanding, the Precursor AI we activated on {PLANETNAME} has identified our own people as intruders and unleashed its defense protocols. This catastrophic misjudgment has resulted in a massive loss of life. We must act swiftly to prevent further disaster.

Label: Event_PrecursorAICatastrophe_Choice_Shutdown_Desc
String: Immediately Shut Down the AI

Label: Event_PrecursorAICatastrophe_Choice_Shutdown_Details
String: Shutting down the AI is the only option to immediately cease its fatal protocols. While this stops further loss of life, the decision will remove the benefits the AI provided.

Label: Event_HomeworldEfficiencyBoost_0x9A2_Name
String: Homeworld Efficiency Investigation is Complete

Label: Event_HomeworldEfficiencyBoost_0x9A2_Desc
String: Our extensive investigation into enhancing homeworld efficiency has borne fruit. We have developed a series of groundbreaking policies and techniques that will significantly increase our manufacturing capabilities, catapulting our production capacity to new heights.

Label: Event_HomeworldEfficiencyBoost_Choice_Implement_Desc
String: Implement the New Efficiency Policies

Label: Event_HomeworldEfficiencyBoost_Choice_Implement_Details
String: By implementing these new policies, we stand on the brink of a manufacturing revolution. This will not only boost our production but also set a new standard for efficiency and innovation on our homeworld.

Label: Event_HomeworldEfficiencyBoost_Choice_Implement_Result
String: Efficiency Policy

Label: Event_CoretapDestabilization_0x8D3_Name
String: Planetary Coretap Destabilization

Label: Event_CoretapDestabilization_0x8D3_Desc
String: The ancient coretap we made use of on {PLANETNAME}, once thought to be a boon, has now caused severe destabilization of our planet's core. This has triggered environmental catastrophes and poses a threat to all life. We must act swiftly to mitigate this disaster.

Label: Event_CoretapDestabilization_Choice_Contain_Desc
String: Initiate Containment Measures

Label: Event_CoretapDestabilization_Choice_Contain_Details
String: We will save the planet but it will never be quite the same.

Label: Event_DreadLordShipSummoned_0x9C6_Name
String: Dread Lord Ship Emergence

Label: Event_DreadLordShipSummoned_0x9C6_Desc
String: YOu may recall the Dread Lord archive we found on {PLANETNAME}.  You may also recall we decided to use it. [BR][BR]Unfortunately, our interaction with the Dread Lord archive has had an unforeseen and alarming consequence. A massive Dread Lord ship has been summoned into a nearby star system. This formidable vessel poses a significant threat to our security and demands immediate attention.

Label: Event_DreadLordShipSummoned_Choice_Engage_Desc
String: Prepare to Engage the Dread Lord Ship

Label: Event_DreadLordShipSummoned_Choice_Engage_Details
String: The Dread Lord ship should be easy to find. It will be the one bristling with weapons of death.

Label: Event_TerraformingCatastrophe_0xF13_Name
String: Catastrophic Terraforming Failure

Label: Event_TerraformingCatastrophe_0xF13_Desc
String: The reckless approach we took on {PLANETNAME} to terraforming has backfired, leading to a severe ecological collapse on the planet.  A massive release of toxic gasses from below the mantle of the planet has killed the entire planet.[BR][BR]While the toxic fumes are short-lived, the death of our colonists is quite real.

Label: Event_TerraformingCatastrophe_Choice_Repair_Desc
String: We will need to bring new colonists.

Label: Event_TerraformingCatastrophe_Choice_Repair_Details
String: With all life gone we will have to transport new colonists to the planet.

Label: Event_UniversalTranslatorTourism_Name
String: Galactic Tourism Initiative

Label: Event_UniversalTranslatorTourism_Desc
String: The breakthrough in Universal Translator technology has opened a gateway for interspecies communication, turning our planet into a potential hub for interstellar tourism. This presents us with a unique opportunity: to become a crossroads for galactic civilizations, where knowledge, culture, and commerce can be exchanged freely and efficiently. As we contemplate this prospect, we must consider the infrastructural and diplomatic challenges it poses. [BR][BR]Put another way, we have an opportunity to make some tourism income from alien visitors.

Label: Event_UniversalTranslatorTourism_Choice_Welcome_Desc
String: Let's construct the Galactic Nexus Pavilion

Label: Event_UniversalTranslatorTourism_Choice_Welcome_Details
String: We should proceed with caution with this as this will make some people very unhappy on our world.

Label: Event_UniversalTranslatorTourism_Choice_Reject_Desc
String: We are not turning our homeworld into an amusement park.

Label: Event_UniversalTranslatorTourism_Choice_Welcome_Results
String: Dislike alien tourism policy

Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Name
String: Galactic Contamination Concern

Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Desc
String: There is a wave of revulsion sweeping through our ranks. [BR][BR]The citizenry abhors the very thought of intermingling with the galaxy's lesser beings as a result of our exploration. They dread not just the dilution of our superior genetics but the erosion of our hallowed culture, the tainting of our sacred bloodlines, and the defilement of our ancestral legacies. [BR][BR]The people for look to your decisive leadership to safeguard our purity as we cast our shadow across the galaxy.

Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Choice_0_Desc
String: Implement the Crucible of Pain enhancement on our Homeworld to harden our populace.

Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Choice_0_Details
String: The Crucible of Pain will reinforce our citizens' strength and purity, ensuring the superiority of our kind.

Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Choice_1_Desc
String: Dispatch those who express fear to the front lines in colony ships.

Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Choice_1_Details
String: By facing the unknown, our people will either return victorious or not at all. The weak will be weeded out.

Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Choice_2_Desc
String: Perhaps we should be more open to other species and realize that we are no better than anyone else.

Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Choice_2_Details
String: This controversial decree may be seen as a weakness by many, challenging the very core of our beliefs.

Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_OurLeaderIsAWeakling
String: Our leader is a weakling.
